comment.text: The translation key "SubmitToFormGallery" is used to display the phrase "Submit to Form Gallery" in various UI elements, such as a modal dialog and a button. It appears on-screen when interacting with form galleries or submitting forms to gallery views, helping users understand their options.

usage.context:
isSeparator: true,
 },
 {
 id: "option_submit-to-gallery",
 key: "submit-to-gallery",
 label: t("Common:SubmitToFormGallery"),
 icon: FormFileReactSvgUrl,
 onClick: () => this.onClickSubmitToFormGallery(item),
 isOutsideLink: true,
 disabled: !item.security?.SubmitToFormGallery,
 },

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'تسليم إلى نموذج المعرض' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Submit to Form Gallery'. It's overly literal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: إرسال إلى معرض النماذج (Irsal ila ma'rid an-namoothaj) - which is a more idiomatic and commonly used phrasing. Alternatively, يمكنك إضافته إلى معرض النماذج (Yumkinuk idaafatuhu ila ma'rid an-namoothaj) - which means 'You can add it to the Form Gallery'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "An die Formulargalerie senden" is understandable, a more natural and idiomatic German translation for "Submit to Form Gallery" would be something like "Absenden an die Formulargalerie" or "Zur Formulargalerie einreichen". "Senden" implies sending something physical, which isn't the intended meaning in this context. "Absenden" or "einreichen" is more appropriate for submitting digital content.

The Armenian translation "Ներկայացնել ձևերի պատկերասրահի " is too literal and doesn't quite convey the meaning of 'Submit to Form Gallery'. It translates to 'Present to gallery of forms'. A more natural and accurate translation would convey the action of submitting or adding the form to the gallery.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider "Հավելել ձևերի պատկերասրահին" (Add to Form Gallery) or "Տեղափոխել ձևերի պատկերասրահին" (Move to Form Gallery).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Invia alla Galleria dei moduli" is understandable, a more natural and accurate translation would be "Pubblica nella galleria dei moduli" or "Condividi nella galleria dei moduli". "Invia" can imply sending something directly, whereas 'Publish' or 'Share' better convey the action of making a form available in a gallery.
The translation lacks punctuation. It is missing a period at the end of the sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: フォームギャラリーに投稿します。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation "ສະເບີກສະບັບສົ່ງໄປທີ່ຫ້ອງສະໝຸດແບບຟອມ" is a literal translation and doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'Submit to Form Gallery'. It implies creating a copy and sending it to a form library, which isn't the intended meaning. A more natural translation would convey the action of making a form available in a gallery.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation like "ສົ່ງແບບຟອມສູ່ຫ້ອງສະໝຸດແບບຟອມ" or "ປະກາດໃຊ້ແບບຟອມໃນຫ້ອງສະໝຸດແບບຟອມ" depending on the specific nuance desired.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "ආකෘතිපත්‍ර එකතුවට යොමන්න" doesn't perfectly convey the meaning of "Submit to Form Gallery". While 'ආකෘතිපත්‍ර' translates to 'form', 'එකතුවට' means 'to a collection' and 'යොමන්න' means 'go/proceed'. A more accurate translation would emphasize the act of submitting or adding.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'ආකෘතිපත්‍ර පත්‍රිකාගාරයට ඉදිරිපත් කරන්න' (Akruthipatrapattrikagarayata idiripath karanne) which translates to 'Submit to the Forms Gallery' or 'ආකෘතිපත්‍ර පත්‍රිකාගාරයට ඇdirname' (Akruthipatrapattrikagarayata adinnama) which translates to 'Add to Forms Gallery'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Oddaj v Fgalerijo obrazcev' uses 'Fgalerijo' which is an abbreviation of 'Galerijo'. It should be the full word 'Galerijo'. While understood, using the full word is more professional and accurate.

The translation 'Поднеси у Форм Галерију' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Submit to Form Gallery'. 'Поднети' implies presenting or submitting a physical object. 'Submit' in this context refers to adding or publishing a form to a gallery.

The translation "Podnesi u Form Galeriju" doesn't fully capture the meaning of "Submit to Form Gallery." "Podnesi" implies presenting or handing over, which isn't the best fit. "Submit" in this context means to offer or publish to a gallery.

While "Gửi đến Bộ Sưu Tập Biểu Mẫu" is technically correct, it's a bit literal and sounds slightly unnatural in Vietnamese. A more natural phrasing would convey the meaning of submitting to a gallery of forms.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Gửi lên Thư Viện Biểu Mẫu
